name: PoPoLoCrois
description: PoPoLoCrois is a cell-shaded role-playing game designed for the PSP. The game features 30-plus hours of gameplay, a save-on-the-go feature, and anime event sequences. The premise of the game is to save your mother from the Ice Demon by engaging in turn-based action. There are more than 10 playable characters in the game, which you can control manually or with selectable AI.
